homeHeader.title: Start, Structure, and Scale Your Business in the UAE Stress-Free with One Nexuz
homeHeader.description: Frustrated by endless paperwork, foreign regulations, and conflicting advice on where to register? At One Nexuz, our seasoned business setup consultants in Dubai empower you with clear, expert guidance, tax-efficient company formation, and the best-fit trade license. Expand into fast-growing global markets, build strategic partnerships, and amplify your revenue to position your business for limitless growth!

leftSection_1.title: Plug into Strategic Ports, Win Instant Customer Trust, and Maximise Your Global Returns
leftSection_1.description: Build your business in the world's most dynamic hub for business, trade, and investment, and unlock global credibility, 100% foreign ownership, and lightning-fast setup to scale faster.

items.description: Gain strategic access to key seaports, airports, and a modern network of highways to connect with over 2 billion consumers across the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and Europe.

items.subTitle: Avoid Local Sponsors, Gain 100% Strategic Ownership, and Repatriate Earnings Easily
items.description: Take control of your business, shape your company's future, and scale on your terms without the hassle of hunting and partnering with a local sponsor.

items.title: Slash Your Tax Burden, Boost Your Profits, and Reinvest with Confidence
items.subTitle: Slash Your Tax Burden, Boost Your Profits, and Reinvest with Confidence
items.description: Enjoy 100% corporate and personal tax exemptions, 0% import and export taxes, and complete profit repatriation to uplift your bottom line and reinvest more into scaling your business.

items.title: Cut Setup Costs, Fast-Track License, Start Selling

items.description: Stay ahead of the curve by leveraging the UAE's cutting-edge In5 Centres, incubators, and industry clusters, robust networking infrastructure, and a highly skilled workforce.

leftSection_5.title: Go From Idea to Launch in 5 Simple Steps with One Nexuz

items.title: Book a Free Consultation
items.description: We’ll kick off with a no-obligation call to discuss your business goals and recommend the best jurisdiction and license type to match your vision.

items.title: Pick Your Trade Name
items.description: Next, our business consultants will help you brainstorm and register a compliant trade name, legal structure, and business activity.

items.title: Secure Your Business License
items.description: Once you choose the best-fit business activity, we’ll help you register your entity and secure your trade license within days, not weeks

items.title: Open Your Corporate Bank Account
items.description: Next, our seasoned consultants will assist you in opening a personal or corporate bank account and processing your UAE residence visa.

items.title: Enjoy Post-Setup Business Support
items.description: Beyond company registration, our seasoned consultants assist in license renewals, VAT filings, and more, so you stay 100% compliant.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How do I set up my business in the UAE?

list.listTitle: You can kickstart your business in the UAE by:
items: Register your business and obtain the necessary licenses
Set up your business bank account

items.question: Can I set up in the UAE with 100% foreign ownership?
items.answer: Yes, you can obtain complete strategic ownership of your business in the UAE Free Zone and select areas of the UAE Mainland.

items.question: How long does it take to set up a business in the UAE?
items.answer: Generally, it takes 1-14 business days to launch your business in the UAE. However, our experts can help you get started within a week.

items.question: Do you need a physical office to start a business in the UAE?
items.answer: No, you can explore alternatives, including flexi-desk, co-working offices, and virtual office spaces, empowering you to set up without breaking the bank.

items.question: What support services does One Nexuz offer in its business setup packages?
items.answer: Our experts streamline licensing, office leasing, visa processing, banking assistance, and post-setup compliance to help you thrive in the UAE’s hyper-competitive market.
